name: Robo Shootout 2 - Mission Space
description:
[Game Infomartion:]

"Robo Shootout 2 - Missions Space" Is a 2D top-down shooter game.

This Mysterious Game takes you to the space, Take missions from Ellen Stofan and beat huge waves of alien spaceships attacking the earth. EFS Sundersen is the alien boss, find and defeat him to save the earth.

Show themselves your power! Help "Leonard" fight aliens through 13 mysterious galaxies.

Enjoy this game with stunning HD graphics and HQ Musics and Sound effects.

Robo Shootout 2 - Mission Space is G RATED : Safe for all Ages

[CHEATS]

Goto: Local Disk (C)* --> Users --> //Your Username// --> App Data --> Local --> Robo Shootout 2 - Space --> Open "data.ini" with notepad. This text file includes all the data of game. Edit these values, then save it.

*Where you have windows installed.

YOUTUBE VIDEO:

MEDIA:

http://shinobiarya123.wix.com/roboshootout-2#!media/cjg9

-----------------------------------

Controls and Details;

W,A,S,D - Move

Mouse Move - Aim

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Shield

<Space> - Launch Rockets
